episodes.title: My #1 Secret Tool For Finding The Best Products To Sell On Amazon With LOW Competition
episodes.summary: The #1 question that Matthew and Mike are always asked is, if I start a business on Amazon what am I going to sell? This is truly the #1 question that gets asked. In this podcast Matthew shares his #1 secret tool that he and his partner Mike are using to find low competition markets with huge profit margins.

episodes.title: 16 Exact Steps To Building a $650,000 Amazon Business In 12 Months Flat With NO Experience...
episodes.summary:
In this episode Matthew breaks down the EXACT 16 step process he and Mike implemented in their Amazon Business to Build a $650,000 business on Amazon Alone in 12 months Flat with Absolutely NO EXPERIENCE. 

If you truly want to build passive income online, if you want the ability to do what you want, when you want with who you want, if you want the ability to spend more time with your children and if you want to start living a lifestyle by design rather than default this episode is a must for you. 

When you follow these proven and tested risk free steps you will succeed.

episodes.title: Passive Amazon Income - Intro
episodes.summary: In this episode Matthew Behdjou introduces you to the Passive Amazon Income Podcast outlining exactly what you can expect on the upcoming episodes. Learn about Matthew's story and how he got started online and most importantly how he can help you create the same success he has for you and your family. If you've ever wanted to build passive income streams that provide true passive income for you and your family then this show is a must listen. As a special gift Matthew has put together a free video report that you can download for free with no strings attached by simply visiting http://www.AmazonSecrets.net
